Interface CallableOnGameController

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
GameController, SocketClientManager
public interface CallableOnGameController extends Remote

  • Method Details

    • showMessage

      void showMessage(String s) throws IOException
      Displays a message to the user.
      Parameters:
      s - the message to be displayed
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the operation

    • playerPicksHiddenComponent

      void playerPicksHiddenComponent(String nickname) throws IOException
      Allows a player identified by their nickname to pick a hidden component during the game.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player who wants to pick a hidden component.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input or output exception occurs during the operation.

    • playerWantsToPlaceFocusedComponent

      void playerWantsToPlaceFocusedComponent(String nickname, Coordinates coordinates, int rotation) throws IOException
      Allows the player to place a focused component on the game board at a specified position with a given rotation. The placement is performed based on the player's nickname, the coordinates of the placement, and the desired rotation angle.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player initiating the placement
      coordinates - the coordinates where the component should be placed
      rotation - the rotation of the component in degrees
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the communication or processing of the request

    • playerWantsToReserveFocusedComponent

      void playerWantsToReserveFocusedComponent(String nickname) throws IOException
      Handles the player's request to reserve the currently focused component during the game. This action allows the player to temporarily mark a specific component for their use.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player making the request
      Throws:
      IOException - if an input or output error occurs during processing

    • playerWantsToReleaseFocusedComponent

      void playerWantsToReleaseFocusedComponent(String nickname) throws IOException
      Handles the player's action to release focus from the currently focused component in the game.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player requesting to release the focused component
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while processing the request

    • playerEndsBuildShipBoardPhase

      void playerEndsBuildShipBoardPhase(String nickname) throws IOException
      Signals that the player identified by their nickname has completed the build ship board phase in the game.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the unique identifier of the player completing the build ship board phase
      Throws:
      IOException - if an input or output exception occurs

    • playerPicksVisibleComponent

      void playerPicksVisibleComponent(String nickname, Integer choice) throws IOException
      Allows a player to select a visible component in the game.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player making the selection
      choice - the ID or index of the visible component being selected by the player
      Throws:
      IOException - if an input-output error occurs during the execution of the method

    • playerWantsToVisitLocation

      void playerWantsToVisitLocation(String nickname, Boolean choice) throws IOException
      Handles a player's decision regarding visiting a specific location in the game.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The player's unique identifier or username.
      choice - A Boolean value indicating whether the player wants to visit the location (true) or not (false).
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input or output exception occurs during the operation.

    • playerWantsToThrowDices

      void playerWantsToThrowDices(String nickname) throws IOException
      Allows a player to indicate their desire to throw dices during the game.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player who wants to throw dices
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while processing the request

    • playerChoseDoubleEngines

      void playerChoseDoubleEngines(String nickname, List<Coordinates> doubleEnginesCoords, List<Coordinates> batteryBoxesCoords) throws IOException
      Handles the player's decision to choose double engines for their ship. The method receives the nickname of the player and the coordinates of the double engines as well as the battery boxes required for their operation.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player making the choice
      doubleEnginesCoords - a list of Coordinates representing the positions of the double engines selected by the player
      batteryBoxesCoords - a list of Coordinates representing the positions of the battery boxes chosen by the player to power the double engines
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error during the process

    • playerChoseDoubleCannons

      void playerChoseDoubleCannons(String nickname, List<Coordinates> doubleCannonsCoords, List<Coordinates> batteryBoxesCoords) throws IOException
      Handles the player's choice of double cannons on their ship. This method is triggered when a player selects the placement of double cannon components and their respective battery box components.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player's unique identifier or nickname
      doubleCannonsCoords - a list of Coordinates specifying the locations of the double cannon components
      batteryBoxesCoords - a list of Coordinates specifying the locations of the battery box components
      Throws:
      IOException - if any connectivity or communication issue occurs

    • playerChoseCabins

      void playerChoseCabins(String nickname, List<Coordinates> cabinCoords) throws IOException
      This method is invoked when a player chooses the cabin components for their ship. It allows the player to specify the locations of the cabin components on the ship board.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the unique identifier or name of the player who is making the selection
      cabinCoords - a list of coordinates representing the positions of the chosen cabin components on the ship board
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the operation

    • playerWantsToVisitPlanet

      void playerWantsToVisitPlanet(String nickname, int choice) throws IOException
      Handles the player's decision to visit a specific planet during the game.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player making the decision
      choice - an integer representing the player's choice regarding the planet
      Throws:
      IOException - if an input or output exception occurs

    • playerWantsToAcceptTheReward

      void playerWantsToAcceptTheReward(String nickname, Boolean choice) throws IOException
      Handles the player's decision on whether to accept a given reward.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player making the decision.
      choice - the player's decision, where true indicates acceptance and false indicates refusal.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the processing of the player's decision.

    • playerHandleSmallDanObj

      void playerHandleSmallDanObj(String nickname, List<Coordinates> shieldCoords, List<Coordinates> batteryBoxCoords) throws IOException
      Handles the small dangerous objects encountered by a player in the game. The method allows the player to specify shields and battery boxes to handle the event.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player who is handling the small dangerous objects
      shieldCoords - a list of coordinates representing the positions of shields to activate
      batteryBoxCoords - a list of coordinates representing the positions of battery boxes to use
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the processing of the player's actions

    • playerHandleBigMeteorite

      void playerHandleBigMeteorite(String nickname, List<Coordinates> doubleCannonCoords, List<Coordinates> batteryBoxCoords) throws IOException
      Handles the player's response to a big meteorite event in the game.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player taking the action
      doubleCannonCoords - a list of coordinates indicating the positions of double cannons the player intends to use
      batteryBoxCoords - a list of coordinates specifying the locations of the battery boxes related to the player's action
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the operation

    • playerHandleBigShot

      void playerHandleBigShot(String nickname) throws IOException
      Handles the event where the player specified by the given nickname reacts to a "big shot" scenario in the game. This method generally involves managing the player's actions or choices in high-impact game events.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the unique nickname of the player who is taking action during the "big shot" event
      Throws:
      IOException - if an input or output exception occurs during communication or data handling

    • playerChoseStorage

      void playerChoseStorage(String nickname, List<Coordinates> storageCoords) throws IOException
      Handles the player's action of choosing storage coordinates.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player making the choice
      storageCoords - a list of Coordinates representing the locations on the shipBoard where the player has chosen to place storage components
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the process

    • spreadEpidemic

      void spreadEpidemic(String nickname) throws IOException
      Allows the specified player to trigger an epidemic event within the game.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player initiating the epidemic event
      Throws:
      IOException - if an input or output error occurs during the execution

    • stardustEvent

      void stardustEvent(String nickname) throws IOException
      Handles the stardust event action for a specific player identified by their nickname.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player invoking the stardust event
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the execution of the stardust event

    • playerWantsToRestartHourglass

      void playerWantsToRestartHourglass(String nickname) throws IOException
      Allows the player with the specified nickname to restart the hourglass timer.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player who wants to restart the hourglass.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during the operation.

    • notifyHourglassEnded

      void notifyHourglassEnded(String nickname) throws IOException
      Notifies the system that the hourglass timer has ended for a specific player.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player whose hourglass has ended
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while processing the notification

    • leaveGameAfterCreation

      void leaveGameAfterCreation(String nickname) throws IOException
      Allows a player to leave the game immediately after the game creation phase.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player who wishes to leave the game.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the process.

    • playerWantsToRemoveComponent

      void playerWantsToRemoveComponent(String nickname, Coordinates coordinate) throws IOException
      Allows a player to remove a specific component from their shipboard at the specified coordinates.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player requesting the removal of the component
      coordinate - the coordinates of the component to be removed
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the operation

    • playerChoseShipPart

      void playerChoseShipPart(String nickname, Set<Coordinates> shipPart) throws IOException
      Allows a player to choose parts of the ship during the ship-building phase. The chosen ship parts are provided as a set of coordinates corresponding to their positions on the ship board.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player making the selection
      shipPart - a set of coordinates representing the ship parts selected by the player
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the operation

    • playerWantsToFocusReservedComponent

      void playerWantsToFocusReservedComponent(String nickname, int choice) throws IOException
      Allows a player to focus on a reserved game component.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player making the request
      choice - an integer representing the specific reserved component to focus on
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is a communication issue during the process

    • playerPlacesPawn

      void playerPlacesPawn(String nickname) throws IOException
      Allows a player to place their pawn in the game. This method sends a request based on the player's specified nickname to perform the action of placing the pawn.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the unique identifier of the player placing the pawn
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while processing the request

    • handleClientChoice

      void handleClientChoice(String nickname, PlayerChoicesDataStructure choice) throws IOException
      Handles the client's choice made during the game. This method processes the player's decision based on the provided choice data structure.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player making the choice
      choice - the data structure representing the player's choice
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the processing of the choice

    • submitCrewChoices

      void submitCrewChoices(String nickname, Map<Coordinates,CrewMember> choices) throws IOException
      Submits the crew choices made by a player.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player making the choices
      choices - a map containing the coordinates of ship components as keys and the crew member assigned to those coordinates as values
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an issue with communication or data transmission

    • requestPrefabShips

      void requestPrefabShips(String nickname) throws IOException
      Sends a request to retrieve the list of available prefab ships for the specified player.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player requesting the prefab ships.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an error during the communication or data retrieval process.

    • requestSelectPrefabShip

      void requestSelectPrefabShip(String nickname, String prefabShipId) throws IOException
      Requests the selection of a prefab ship for the specified player.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player making the request.
      prefabShipId - The unique identifier of the prefab ship to be selected.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input or output error occurs during the request.

    • playerWantsToLand

      void playerWantsToLand(String nickname) throws IOException
      Signals that a player, identified by their nickname, intends to land in the game. This method handles the player's request to perform the landing action during the appropriate phase of the game.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the unique identifier of the player who wants to land
      Throws:
      IOException - if an input or output exception occurs during the execution of the request

    • startCheckShipBoardAfterAttack

      void startCheckShipBoardAfterAttack(String nickname) throws IOException
      Initiates the process of checking the ship's board state after an attack has occurred.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player whose ship's board needs to be checked
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error in the communication process

    • debugSkipToLastCard

      void debugSkipToLastCard() throws IOException
      Skips the game to the last card in the current sequence of cards. This method is used for debugging purposes and allows for quickly advancing the game state to the final stage of the card sequence.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the operation

    • evaluatedCrewMembers

      void evaluatedCrewMembers(String nickname) throws IOException
      Evaluates the crew members for the player specified by the given nickname.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player whose crew members are to be evaluated
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the evaluation process
